_meta.description: DIGEST version mapping - includes only essential enforcement sections
_meta.purpose: Rules, boundaries, gates, anti-patterns, sub-agent triggers
_meta.excludes: Deep reference material, verbose examples, detailed procedures
_meta.token_budget: All DIGEST files combined must be <25k tokens

CLAUDE_DIGEST.md.description: Minimal router file (~2-3k chars) - loading strategy and essential triggers

CLAUDE_CORE_DIGEST.md.description: Essential workflow context (~8-10k chars) - non-negotiable rules and constraints

CLAUDE_LEAD_DIGEST.md.description: LEAD phase essentials (~3-4k chars) - approval gates and validation requirements

CLAUDE_PLAN_DIGEST.md.description: PLAN phase essentials (~4-5k chars) - PRD requirements and validation gates

CLAUDE_EXEC_DIGEST.md.description: EXEC phase essentials (~4-5k chars) - implementation requirements and constraints
